root.title: 58 The White Bum II
root.place: The location is on 1.5 km from village White Bum (Belyi Bum), above the inscription White Bum I in 10 cm from the mountain’s foot.
root.description: The vertical line consists of 5 or 6 signs.
root.size: The line length is 12.1 cm, signs’ height is between 3-5 cm.
root.investigation: Achapov found the inscription. Kadikov copied in 2001. Nevskaya and Tybykova studied in 2005. Publication: Kocheev 523.

pdf.f_title: Свод древнетюркских рунических памятников Горного Алтая. Горно-Алтайск: АКИН, 2006. – 52 с.

refs.ref: Кызласов И.Л. Рунические письменности евразийских степей.-М. 1994.-С. 318.-Рис. 18.
